name: Flail
description: You flail about with a wild strike that increases in power the more injured you are. Make a melee attack roll against a creature, doing 1d6 + MOVE normal damage on a hit. If you are below 50% of your maximum health, double the damage. If you are at 10% or below of your maximum health, triple the damage. The multiplier for this attack occurs before the multiplier for resistances or vulnerabilities.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.

contest.effect: Works better the later it is used in a turn.
